comments: Very Helpful, Keeps your attention, clear instructions on projects

Chef Powell is an awesome instructor that makes class fun and interactive. He truly cares about teaching and about his students. He is always open to discuss class or to assist with problems you encounter. A true asset to this institution!

Great professor. Can tell he lives to teach students not for the paycheck. Very understanding. He cares very much for his students. Great guy! Took him for 2 classes and can\'t wait to take him again. You have to work for an A but he isn\'t difficult by any means! Great teacher/guy! Highly recommend
